texts.name: welcome_davis_one.mp3
texts.text: Welcome to Malden, Lieutenant Wilson. We've been looking forward to have you with us. It's been pretty boring here sitting around and seeing nothing is happening on this island.

texts.name: welcome_davis_two.mp3
texts.text: Yeah, I was informed by the high command, that's pretty quiet at the moment. The last years were harsh on this island. Hopefully the tensions will keep low as long we are here.

texts.name: welcome_davis_three.mp3
texts.text: We'll see, things can get out of control very fast sometimes. You just need a match to start the fire.

texts.name: welcome_davis_four.mp3
texts.text: Let's hope for the best. Are the other teammates arrived yet?

texts.name: welcome_davis_five.mp3
texts.text: Yeas, everybody's here already. You can meet Captainâ€¦ at the barracks. Name1 and Name2 are in the commanding centre.
